item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - Challenge - Excel 4.0 Macros
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend challenge writeup analyzing a malicious Excel 4.0 (XLM) macro document using XLMMacroDeobfuscator and oletools to identify process execution, regsvr32 abuse, and DLL payload behavior.
